articles.author: Eric Levenson and Melissa Alonso, CNN
articles.title: Alabama executed a death row inmate despite pleas from the victim's family not to
articles.description: Alabama inmate Joe Nathan James Jr. was executed Thursday night for the 1994 murder of Faith Hall Smith, the state's top attorney said, despite pleas from the victim's family not to do so.
articles.content:
(CNN)Alabama inmate Joe Nathan James Jr. was executed Thursday nightfor the 1994 murder of Faith Hall Smith, the state's top attorney said, despite pleas from the victim's family not to do so.
